title:
Genshin Impact
player cards.
Upgraded.
subtitle: Fetch data from your Character Showcase and display a build card, instantly.
uid_whitelist:
This UID needs to be whitelisted
for beta-testing.
uid_1:
If you've been a part of the Open Beta Test day, thank you! The site is back to closed beta so I can fix a lot of things I found.
If you want to join, you can become a supporter on Patreon.
You'll be able to view your in-game Character Showcase and send the link to others so they can view your profile.
uid_2:
After the full version releases, supporters will have access to further beta-test features, such as unique short links.

Follow the Twitter for updates! The beta should end when 2.7 starts.

profile.closed: Please enable the "Show Character Details" option in your Character Showcase in-game to see the details.
profile.no_characters: No characters found in the Character Showcase.

is_uid_public: Disable this if you want to keep your UID private.
is_public: Show this account on your public profile.
